TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExpressionEditorService

summary.span: 建立或關閉運算式編輯器。

span.span: Creates or closes expression editors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 運算式編輯器是一個 Visual Basic 控制項，可用來編輯 Visual Studio 內部的運算式。An expression editor is a Visual Basic control used to edit expressions inside Visual Studio. 此控制項提供完整功能的 IDE 編輯經驗，包括 IntelliSense、顏色標示、ParamInfo、錯誤不規則曲線等等。This control provides a full-fledged IDE editing experience, including IntelliSense, colorization, ParamInfo, error squiggles, among other features. 也可以用來管理自訂運算式編輯器的執行個體。The can also be used to manage instances of custom expression editors. 若要註冊自訂運算式編輯器，您必須使用下列程式碼發行 ：To register a custom expression editor, you must publish the using the following code : `this.expressionEditorService = new ExpressionEditorService();` `this.workflowDesigner.Context.Services.Publish(this.expressionEditorService);` 當 執行個體取得焦點時，會建立運算式編輯器，而在失去有效運算式的焦點或重新載入設計工具時，則會終結運算式編輯器。An expression editor is created when an instance gains focus and is destroyed on losing focus of a valid expression, or on reloading of the designer. 預設的運算式編輯器不適用於重新裝載的應用程式。The default expression editor is not available for use in rehosted applications. 如果預設的運算式編輯器用於重新裝載的應用程式，就可以使用文字方塊進行編輯。If the default expression editor is used in a rehosted application, a text box is available for editing. 不過，自訂運算式編輯器可透過發行應用程式中的 ，以用於重新裝載的應用程式。However, custom expression editors can be used in a rehosted application by publishing the in the application. 如果您要使用自訂活動設計工具中的 控制項，就不需要使用這個介面建立和終結運算式編輯器。If you are using an control in a custom activity designer, it is not necessary to create and destroy expression editors using this interface. 類別會為您管理這項工作。The class manages this for you.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CloseExpressionEditors ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CloseExpressionEditors() cil managed
Public Sub CloseExpressionEditors ()
public: void CloseExpressionEditors();

summary.span: 關閉所有作用中的運算式編輯器。

span.span: Closes all the active expression editors.

summary.span: 建立新的運算式編輯器。

span.span: Creates a new expression editor.
